About the Company: IndoStar Capital Finance Private Limited (Indostar? or the Company?), an NBFC is registered with the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) as a Systemically Important Non Deposit Accepting Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC-ND-SI). IndoStar is a wholesale credit institution that offers a wide bouquet of debt products. IndoStar has been established as a premier independent wholesale credit institution leveraging the experience of global best practices and local economic development to meet the growing credit requirements of Indian corporates.
